name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Front-End Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive experience, I excel in developing high-performance applications utilizing **React**, **TypeScript**, **JavaScript**, **HTML**, **CSS**, **Tailwind**, **SCSS**, **Cypress**, and **Jest**. My proficiency in modern development practices such as **Nx monorepo**, **React Query**, and agile methodologies enables me to deliver optimal user experiences and performance improvements.

In addition to my front-end expertise, I have a rich background in building scalable solutions within the healthcare and financial sectors. I have successfully integrated AI/ML capabilities for real-time data processing, employing **Python**, **FastAPI**, and **Django** as part of my tech stack. My strong foundation in microservices architecture and CI/CD automation ensures that I produce robust, secure applications that adhere to compliance standards including HIPAA and PCI DSS.

Passionate about collaboration and fostering a product mindset, I dedicate myself to optimizing applications for performance while leveraging tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** to support machine learning workflows.
